message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay $120 for the product. Thank you for understanding.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $135. This product is of exceptional value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the price.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I can only offer $130. I hope we can come to an agreement.
